Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: gen AI provide direct answers but may not be accurate because gen AI doesn't know details of the assignment. Teachers on the other hand has probably given the same assignment every year to students hence already masters and know average areas to improve from students.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teacher more specific to my case, gen AI is more general.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: teacher sometimes let us work it ourselves by providing examples. they guide us areas need to improve. gen ai just directly give the answer
